question: The "Layou River" is located in which country?
explanation: The Layou River is located in the island country of Dominica, officially the Commonwealth of Dominica, in the Windwards Islands of the Lesser Antilles Archipelago. Layou River is the longest and deepest river in Dominica which rises from the interior of the country and flow westwards to reach the Caribbean Sea. Layou River is always prone to flooding because of the collapse of Matthieu Dam multiple times.
